string-array.name: fingerprint_acquired_vendor
string-array.item: Adjust your finger\nAdjust your finger slightly to record a different side.
Fingerprint already saved\nA similar fingerprint is already saved. Please try again with another finger.
Invalid finger\nThe detected fingerprint could not be used for unlocking, please try again If this error persists, please contact customer support.
